law.catch_line: Except for betting on races of national or international prominence which have been approved by the ...
law.text:
Except for betting on races of national or international prominence which have been approved by the Commission, satellite simulcast betting may not be conducted:
on any day other than Sunday between 1:30 a.m. and 10:00 a.m.; and
between 1:30 a.m. and 11:00 a.m. on Sunday.
